meanings.definition: A person or group that has a strong influence on what is considered fashionable or desirable.
meanings.sent1: The tastemakers in the fashion industry often dictate the latest trends.
meanings.sent2: Many people look to tastemakers for guidance on what to wear.
meanings.sent3: The tastemakers at the party all wore the same unique hat.
meanings.sent4: She was like a tastemaker, effortlessly leading the group with her style choices.
meanings.sent5: The tastemakers' opinions can make or break a new fashion line.

meanings.definition: A person or group that sets trends or standards in a particular field, such as fashion or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The tastemakers in the music industry often discover new talent.
meanings.sent2: Fashion tastemakers attend exclusive events to showcase upcoming trends.
meanings.sent3: The tastemakers at the movie premiere all arrived in matching limousines.
meanings.sent4: He became a tastemaker overnight after his viral video caught the attention of millions.
meanings.sent5: The tastemakers' influence can launch a small brand into the spotlight.
